key.name: no-animations
key.description: Dont animate all inserted rows on startup so the list can instantly jump to the correct scroll-pos

key.name: window-width
key.description: saved with of the window

key.name: window-height
key.description: saved height of the window

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Weather the window was maximized on close so it can be restored in the same way on startup.

key.name: feed-row-width
key.description: Width of the first paned, the feed-row

key.name: feed-row-scrollpos
key.description: The position of the FeedList the user scrolled to at the time the app closes

key.name: feedlist-selected-row
key.description: The feedrow selected when the app closes so it can be restored on open.

key.name: feeds-and-articles-width
key.description: Width of the two first panes, feed-row + article-row

key.name: articlelist-scrollpos
key.description: The position of the ArticleList the user scrolled to at the time the app closes

key.name: articleview-scrollpos
key.description: The position of the ArticleView the user scrolled to at the time the app closes

key.name: articlelist-selected-row
key.description: The artcile selected when the app closes so it can be restored on open.

key.name: articlelist-row-amount
key.description: How much articles to load on startup

key.name: articlelist-new-rows
key.summary: ArticleList number of new rows added during close
key.description: How much articles got added to the db while the app was closed

key.name: show-articles
key.description: Choose what articles are displayed. ALL, only UNREAD or only MARKED.

key.name: expanded-categories
key.description: all the categories that are expanded, showing their feeds and subcategories

key.name: currently-updating
key.description: If the FeedReader is currently updating.

key.name: initial-sync-ongoing
key.description: If the FeedReader is currently busy getting all articles after account configuration.

key.name: spring-cleaning
key.description: Do a vacuum of the db. No other operation can access the db during this.

key.name: last-spring-cleaning
key.summary: timestamp of the last spring cleaning
key.description: Timestamp of the last time the db got vacuumed.

key.name: initial-sync-level
key.description: What operations of the InitSync are already done to restore the checks correctly

key.name: search-term
key.description: String the user filtered the articles by.
